item.title: Panthira add a quote by Eleanor H. Porter
item.description: "Just breathing isn't living!" -- Eleanor H. Porter

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "A wise girl kisses but doesn't love, listens but doesn't believe, and leaves before she is left." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "The real lover is the man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes or just staring into space." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "If you can make a woman laugh, you can make her do anything." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "If you're gonna be two-faced at least make one of them pretty." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Bette Midler
item.description: "Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world." -- Bette Midler

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "She was a girl who knew how to be happy even when she was sad. And that’s important—you know " -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Who said nights were for sleep?" -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "It's often just enough to be with someone. I don't need to touch them. Not even talk. A feeling passes between you both. You're not alone." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "All a girl really wants is for one guy to prove to her that they are not all the same." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by marilyn monroe
item.description: "Friendship is the bestiest thing that comes to life . Friends will always be there for you don't worry about the fakes worry about the people who had your back from the start and never treated you wrong always remember they are your real friends don't never take them as granted because one day your going to lose a good friend by the way your action's are when you see a good friend stick to that person ." -- marilyn monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Boys think girls are like books, If the cover doesn't catch their eye they won't bother to read what's inside." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I live to suceed, not to please you or anyone else." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "To all the girls that think you’re fat because you’re not a size zero, you’re the beautiful one, its society who’s ugly." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I read poetry to save time." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "The thing I want more than anything else? I want to have children. I used to feel for every child I had, I would adopt another." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "It’s better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "A girl doesn't need anyone who doesn't need her" -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Panthira add a quote by mark twain
item.description: "Reader, suppose you were an idiot. And suppose you were a member of Congress. But I repeat myself." -- mark twain

item.title: Panthira add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Loyalty to country ALWAYS. Loyalty to government, when it deserves it." -- Mark Twain
